columns.text: Curved in the mountain, the Amber Light Villas offers the combination of comfortable villas opening to private terraces and balconies with stunning views to the Aegean Sea along with the hotel comforts, services and facilities. Amber Light Villas are located on the east side of the famous village of Imerovigli, just above the beaches of Koloumbos and Pori. It is Just 6 km from Fira, 13 km from the airport, km from the port. Welcome to Santorini and Amber Light Villas. Welcome to a brand new suites complex with hotel facilities at the east side of the island! Inspired by the amber light of the sun rising above the sea just in front of your suite, we created a holiday treat for all your senses. The comfort, the unique allure of the landscape, the privacy, the tastes and the spa treatments are just some of the elements that will make your holidays in Santorini utterly beautiful and unforgettable.

items.title: Abelonas Retreat|Sunset & Sunrise Lodgings
items.description: Located in the marvelous village of Imerovigli, just a mere 2 km from the bustling capital of Fira, Abelonas Retreat combines the perfect accommodation for endless relaxing moments, along with easy accessibility to the vibrant and busy lifestyle of the Theransday and night. Imerovigli has been named The Balcony of the Aegean and for a very good reason. This is in fact the pinnacle of the island, perched on a cliff top that overlooks the infinite blue sea and the Theran archipelago. An oasis of calm is waiting to welcome you for a unique experience on the island of Santorini, unveiling its most magical scenery. Abelonas Retreat is composed of 13 studios, suites and maisonettes, each in line with the Cycladic architecture and the most refined stylistic approach that captures the islands identity. Whether you are a morning person or you love watching the sun melt into the deep blue sea, you are more than welcome to choose the lodging that will make your dreams come true. Some of the lodgings showcase an outstanding sunrise view, while others open up to the earth-shuttering sunsetboth a source of inspiration and not only to the romantic at heart! Throughout the day, enjoy the shimmering sun in between your dives in the modern outdoor swimming pool. Lay back on the sun loungers, order a fruity cocktail or a healthy snack and just appreciate the moment. And when it is time for the sunset, a unique masterpiece of nature unfolds before your eyes. The sun dips in the sea and thousands of chromatic hues spread on the sky, sparkling and brightA fusion like no other, where the natural elements join forces and create a moment in time to remembertill the next one, here at Abelonas Retreat | Sunset & Sunrise lodgings in Santorini!
items.excerpt: Located in the marvelous village of Imerovigli, just a mere 2 km from the bustling capital of Fira, Abelonas Retreat combines the perfect accommodation for endless relaxing moments, along with easy accessibility to the vibrant and busy lifestyle of the Theransday and night.

items.title: Athermi Suites Santorini
items.description: A compelling blend of legendary old-school hospitality in an unsurpassed location. Athermi Suites invites you to experience Santorini at its purest and most overwhelming. A domestic and stylish atmosphere combined with exceptionally personalised service that affords guests an intimate glimpse of everyday life on Santorini, without sacrificing comfort or privacy. Walk through the picturesque wooden gates of Athermi Suites and feel the embrace of its warm, personalised and discreet service that will make you feel right at home. All suites boast big verandas facing the sea, and their interiors in simple, elegant, Cycladic style perfectly complement the majestic views over the Aegean. A compelling blend of unsurpassed location and legendary old-school hospitality, Athermi Suites invites you to experience Santorini at its purest and most overwhelming. Let the loving couple Maria and Kosmas welcome and pamper you at what is more than just a place to stay. As soon as you cross the picturesque wooden gates of Athermi Suites you will feel the embrace of its warm, personalised and discreet service that will make you feel right at home.The simple, elegant interiors in the internationally famous local Cycladic style complement the majestic views over the Aegean in absolute harmony, as all suites boast big verandas facing the sea.For a refreshing dip you may opt for the propertys sensational pool, one of the largest in the Caldera. But whatever you do, make sure you do not miss the opportunity to indulge in Marias special treats, prepared especially for you. In Santorinis lesser known Megalohori village, couples and families will discover a slice of paradise.
items.excerpt: Walk through the picturesque wooden gates of Athermi Suites and feel the embrace of its warm, personalised and discreet service that will make you feel right at home.

amenities.item: Ideal for wedding ceremonies at the hotels chapel, and wedding receptions by the pool
One of only a few 3* superior new boutique hotels on the cliffside
All suites have magnificent views of the Aegean Sea, volcano and sunset
